name: MOCCA X RIO NOVTRIANSYAH - BANDUNG
description:
Mocca’s journey began in Bandung city as they bumped into each other at the same college. Most of their songs were inspired by stories from close friends and people around them at that time.
 
Rio captured this brilliantly on this artwork and it was also featured on Mocca’s Secret Show in 2018. This piece also became the stepping stone towards their collaboration in the future.

Artwork by Rio Novtriansyah
Mixed media graphite & watercolor on Fontaine 300gsm cotton watercolor paper
